data: When a man of thirty who has been sound and well since boyhood suddenly realizes there is something radically wrong with him, it amounts almost to a tragedy.
A Maid of the Kentucky Hills
Litsey, Edwin Carlile, 1874-1970; Cassel, John Harmon, 1872-1961 [Illustrator]
